## ERC20TransferTier.(constructor)

Constructs a new ERC20TransferTier from a known address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(address: string, signer: Signer);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | The address of the ERC20TransferTier contract |
|  signer | Signer | An ethers.js Signer |
